# Feature Tests

## 1. Basic LaTeX Output

```{maxima}
#| tex: true
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
integrate(x^2, x);
```

## 2. Simplification

```{maxima}
#| tex: true
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
#| trigsimp: true
sin(x)^2 + cos(x)^2;
```

## 3. High-Precision Arithmetic

```{maxima}
#| bfloat: true
#| fpprec: 50
sqrt(2);
```

## 4. Session Persistence

First chunk defines variables:

```{maxima}
#| session: "test"
a: 15;
b: 25;
```

Second chunk uses them:

```{maxima}
#| session: "test"
#| tex: true
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
a + b;
```

## 5. Expansion

```{maxima}
#| tex: true
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
#| expand: true
(x + y + z)^2;
```

## 6. Factoring

```{maxima}
#| tex: true
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
#| factor: true
x^2 - 4;
```

## 7. Solving Equations

```{maxima}
#| tex: true
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
solve(x^2 - 5*x + 6 = 0, x);
```
